product_name: ASICS Gel-Noosa Tri 9 Road-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: Updated with chafe-free seamless construction and loaded with triathlon-specific features, ASICS Gel-Noosa Tri 9 Road-Running shoes are built to breathe, drain well and transition fast on race day. Open mesh uppers are designed to maximize moisture management and offer plenty of breathability; synthetic overlays help provide lightweight support and stability. Seamless materials reduce the potential for irritation and friction caused by traditional stitches and seams. Elastic laces enable an adaptive, snug fit that combines with enhanced heel and tongue grips to make transitions smooth, fast and easy. Perforated insoles drain quickly. Lightweight polymer midsoles offer support and stability with enhanced control for stable, responsive performance through your entire stride. GEL(R) silicone-based gel inserts hindfoot and forefoot absorb excess shock in all directions, delivering cushioning and stability. Impact Guidance System (IGS(R)) helps slow pronation for an optimal gait and natural foot movement from heel strike through toe-off. Special design of the outsoles creates tension as the feet enter propulsion stage, making the transition from mid-stance to toe-off quick and efficient. Glow-in-the-dark print increases your visibility at night. Outsoles on the ASICS Gel-Noosa Tri 9 Road-Running shoes are optimized for traction in wet conditions.
short_description: Updated with chafe-free seamless construction and loaded with triathlon-specific features, ASICS Gel-Noosa Tri 9 Road-Running shoes are built to breathe, drain well and transition fast on race day.
